Synopsis

This module contains all of the Rails plugin code for client-side RestfulCaptcha functionality. It inserts plugin methods into ActionController::Base and ActionView::Base.

Simply add this line to your controller to include the Rails plugin in your application: 

    require 'restful_captcha/rails'
